item.title: Yaniv Hatiel | M.Arch
item.description:
Yaniv Hatiel is a computational architect, designer, and educator, and the founder of 01Architecture, a London-based design and research studio working at the intersection of architectural design, computation, and performance-driven delivery.

With international practice experience at Zaha Hadid Architects, ODA, Kohn Pedersen Fox, and PLP Architecture, Yaniv has contributed to large-scale and complex projects, leading fa√ßade design, geometric rationalisation, and BIM-led coordination. His work focuses on translating ambitious design intent into buildable, high-performance architectural systems through advanced computational workflows.
